testsuite.name: com.aboutcoder.packease.utils.xml.PEJsonXmlConverterTest
testsuite.system-out:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<customer>
	<first-name>Jane</first-name>
	<last-name>Doe</last-name>
	<address>
		<street>123 A Street</street>
	</address>
	<phone-number type="work">555-1111</phone-number>
	<phone-number type="cell">555-2222</phone-number>
</customer>

{
	"customer" : {
		"first-name" : "Jane",
		"last-name" : "Doe",
		"address" : {
			"street" : "123 A Street"
		},
		"phone-number" : [ {
			"@type" : "work",
			"$" : "555-1111"
		}, {
			"@type" : "cell",
			"$" : "555-2222"
		} ]
	}
}
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<customer>
	<first-name>Jane</first-name>
	<last-name>Doe</last-name>
	<address>
		<street>123 A Street</street>
	</address>
	<phone-number type="work">555-1111</phone-number>
	<phone-number type="cell">555-2222</phone-number>
</customer>

{
	"customer" : {
		"first-name" : "Jane",
		"last-name" : "Doe",
		"address" : {
			"street" : "123 A Street"
		},
		"phone-number" : [ {
			"@type" : "work",
			"$" : "555-1111"
		}, {
			"@type" : "cell",
			"$" : "555-2222"
		} ]
	}
}
